list.title: Sessions
list.description: Sessions aggregated from NDJSON files for the selected date (read-only).
list.empty: No Browser Agent sessions for this date.

detail.title: Session details
detail.description: Reconstructed only from local NDJSON metadata and screenshots. No actions will be replayed.
detail.selectHint: Select a session from the left to view details.
detail.showWindowInfo: This page is for visual inspection only. It will not re-run past actions.

redirectTable.collapseTip: {{total}} redirects, click to expand the middle {{middle}} entries
redirectTable.hint: Tip: click the middle row to expand the full redirect chain.

timeline.title: Action timeline (in chronological order)
timeline.empty: No recorded actions for this session.

errors.ipcListNotRegistered: Browser Agent IPC is not registered. Please make sure you are running the desktop app and have restarted it.
errors.detailIpcNotRegistered: Browser Agent detail IPC is not registered. Please make sure you are running the desktop app.
errors.detailNotFound: No detail found for this session (it may have been cleaned or the date does not match).
errors.showWindowInvalidSession: Invalid session ID, cannot show window.
errors.showWindowNotFound: Session is no longer in memory. The app may have restarted or the session has ended.
errors.showWindowNoWindow: This session has no associated window. It may never have successfully opened a browser.
errors.showWindowClosed: The browser window has been closed and cannot be shown again.
errors.showWindowFail: Failed to show browser window. Please try again.
errors.openSnapshotFail: Failed to open screenshot. Please check whether the file still exists.
errors.openSnapshotRetry: Failed to open screenshot. Please try again later.

toasts.showWindowSuccess: Tried to show the browser window. Switch to desktop to view it.
